faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I create an account on GoMoldova?
faq.a1: To create an account on GoMoldova, go to the main page and click the 'Login' button in the top right corner. Then select the 'Register' option and follow the steps to create your account.
faq.q2: How can I book a trip?
faq.a2: After finding a trip that suits you, click the 'View details' button to see more information. If you want to book a seat, click the 'Book seat' button.
faq.q3: How can I cancel a booking?
faq.a3: You can cancel a booking by accessing the 'My Trips' section and selecting the trip you want to cancel. There are no cancellation fees.
faq.a4: Currently, payments are made directly between passenger and driver in cash at the beginning or end of the trip.
